# localAxis

**Instance Property**

A vector that describes the axis of rotation (in local space).

## Declaration

```swift
var localAxis: SIMD3<Float>
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is `[0, 1, 0]`, meaning the rotation occurs around the y-axis.
